column.Name: MaterialType
column.lookupquery: SELECT DISTINCT ct.ComponentTypeID, ct.ComponentDescription, ct.ComponentOrder FROM pPlanningMaterial pm INNER JOIN pMaterial m ON pm.MaterialID = m.MaterialID INNER JOIN pComponentType ct ON m.MaterialType = ct.ComponentTypeID WHERE ct.Active = 1 AND pm.PlanningID = ##ID###PlanningID## AND pm.SeasonYearID = ##ID###SeasonYearID## ORDER BY ct.ComponentOrder

column.Name: A
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom22 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: P
column.lookupquery: SELECT CountryCode, CountryName FROM uCountry Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CountryName

column.Name: S
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom8 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: PlanningMaterialDrop
column.lookupquery: SELECT 0 as Value, 'No' as Text UNION SELECT 1 as Value, 'Yes' as Text
